html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14162018-11-21
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectLGBT Purge Class Action Final Settlement Agreement
PrecisOrder Authorizing the Minister of National Defence to take any actions necessary to implement, on behalf of the Government Canada, the LGBT Purge Class Action Final Settlement Agreement in relation to the proceeding of Todd Edward Ross, Martine Roy and Alida Satalic v. Attorney General of Canada (T-370-17), including making all payments required to implement that Agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
